title: Communications records pertaining to 2717 Grand Ave, DeLand FL (Volusia County Growth And Resource Management)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

This is a Freedom of Information Act and Privacy Act request pursuant to Florida Sunshine Law. I hereby request the following information:  

Please provide me with all internal and external communications, (including but not limited to communications conducted on private devices), including emails, letters, memos, texts, meeting notes, field visit logs, photographs, and records of violations or citations issued against or on my property located at 2717 Grand Ave, DeLand, FL 32720.

This includes but is not limited to communications or information exchanged with or between the County of Volusia, Volusia County Growth and Resource Management, Volusia County Code Compliance, Volusia County Zoning Department, Volusia County Building and Code Administration, Volusia County Council, Volusia County Code Enforcement Board, Volusia County Building Department and Permits, and Wire Wizard Electrical Services LLC. between the dates of June 1, 2022, and March 14, 2024.

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived as I believe this request is in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public free of charge, processed by a representative of the news media/press, and is not for commercial usage.

In the event that fees cannot be waived, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. 

I would prefer the request be filed electronically, by e-mail attachment if available.

Should my request be refused, kindly provide the specific legislative citation for the rejection, as required by Section 119.07(1)(d) of the Florida Statutes.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within a reasonable time frame, according to Section 119.07(1)(a),(c) of the Florida Statutes.

Sincerely,

Lourdes Gonzalez

title: Complaints against Volusia County Code Enforcement officials (Volusia County Growth And Resource Management)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

This is a request for a public record made pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law Freedom of Information Act. I hereby request the following information:  Any investigative, administrative, formal, or informal complaint(s) received (including emails, photos, and other written forms) regarding code enforcement officials Kerry Leuzinger, and/or Paul Traider, and/or Jeff Bergman. 

This includes but is not limited to complaints filed and/or received via the County of Volusia, Volusia County Growth and Resource Management, Volusia County Code Compliance, Volusia County Zoning Department, Volusia County Building and Code Administration, Volusia County Council, Volusia County Code Enforcement Board, and Volusia County Building Department and Permits.

I also request that, if appropriate, fees be waived as I believe this request is in the public interest. The requested documents will be made available to the general public free of charge, processed by a representative of the news media/press, and is not for commercial usage.

In the event that fees cannot be waived, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. 

I would prefer the request be filed electronically, by e-mail attachment if available.

Should my request be refused, kindly provide the specific legislative citation for the rejection, as required by Section 119.07(1)(d) of the Florida Statutes.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within a reasonable time frame, according to Section 119.07(1)(a),(c) of the Florida Statutes.

Sincerely,

Lourdes Gonzalez
